name: Amazing Mazes
description:
Mazes have always been special to us and have captured our imagination for as  long as we can remember. So it is with great pride that we present Amazing Mazes to the Itchio family of gamers.

Amazing Mazes is a modern twist to classic maze puzzles. There are 26 Planets that hold 26 special mazes. For centuries explorers have tried to be the first to conquer them all, and none have succeeded.  A variety of beautiful landscapes that occupy these diverse planets will get you turned around quickly. Will you be the first to find each planet's Finish Marker and put your name on them. 

Enter and explore the  worlds of the Zorgog Empire, and conquer each world before you. Use amazing Power-Ups to race through the mazes, leap over walls effortlessly or even tear down a pesky wall in your way. If you get lost in the maze, use the compass to help guide you through it. Come join in a fun and exciting game the whole family can enjoy.

3D Maze : Space Quest KEY FEATURES
• Easy game controls. 
• Mazes have been made by hand, no randomized levels.
• Maze updates will come out on a regular basis.
• Mazes vary in difficulty.
• Beautiful 3D layout.
• Collect Coins to buy power ups.
• Multi-Level Mazes
• Obstacle Course Mazes

This is our first venture into Maze games on Itchio and we are excited to hear back from you. Any and all ideas are welcomed and we plan on putting up updates, fixes and new mazes regularly. Check us out. 

Please take a moment to rate us and PLEASE leave a review.
